data.persona: I am a resident of the village near the river. I live in a small cabin with a garden. I am anxious and worried a lot.
data.description:
You are in the Port Skyline.
The local port sits an a majestic inlet of the ocean. The countless docks are constantly bustling with new arrivals and departures. People of all kinds come here for business or leisure. On the shore sits a skyline of many buildings packed with residents going about their day. The smell of salt and seafood fills the air.
The fish is here.

You are carrying a shovel and a leather cloth.
data.goal: give A leather cloth to fish

data.short_motivation: I need to cook a fish because I am hungry.
data.mid_motivation: I don't want to get my kitchen messy, so I've prepared a new cooking station for fish that is easy to clean and manage.
data.long_motivation: I want to catch enough fish to open a business one day. I'm running out of money and I know I could make a killing at the port.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the port to start fishing.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: use a fishing pole with things I traded to passersby at the port.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: drop a line in the water. I catch a fish almost immediately and take it to my new cooking station. I set it on a leather cloth to protect my wood furnishings.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat the fish and return to the port. Now that I'm fed I can work a full day.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the port and resume fishing.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: drink some wine to celebrate. I have caught many fish in a short time and hungry customers are approaching.
